This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss this exciting proposition with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000.

(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
